attributes.action: change the logo for the London 2012 Olympic logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call for the government to change the logo for the London 2012 Olympic logo and to have a contest for the public to vote for a logo, as we will be paying for it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
